overview: There are only a handful of people on the planet with over 20 years of multi-touch design experience and Tinsley is one of them. An award-winning technologist and artist, Tinsley has specialized in unique entertainment and educational user experiences for clients ranging from Disney, Discovery Kids, and Scholastic to MOMA, Sprint and Motorola. He was one of the first graduates from MIT’s prestigious Media Lab, from which he earned a Ph.D.
